mapper.insert: insert into tbl_item (id, item_store_id, item_category_id, item_subcategory_id, item_name, item_price, item_stock, item_content) values (#{id}, #{itemStoreId}, #{itemCategoryId}, #{itemSubCategoryId}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemStock}, #{itemContent})
insert into tbl_item_option (option_item_id, option_name, option_detail, option_price, option_stock) values (#{optionItemId}, #{optionName}, #{optionDetail}, #{optionPrice}, #{optionStock})
mapper.select: select id, item_store_id, item_category_id, item_name, item_type, item_stock, item_price, item_delivery_fee, item_content, item_state, item_view_count, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_item where item_state = 'active'
